questions.content: Ms. Vardy's trip to China had to be canceled unexpectedly because her visa was issued______
Some market experts are able______which products are likely to be successful uponrelease.

______volunteers to clean the staff break room during the lunch break will be allowed to go home one hour earlier than usual.
At this year's International Film Awards Show, acceptance speeches will be______to three minutes.

Common______offered to executives by Botrego Corporation include a company car and subsidized housing.

The Chief Technician will arrive at the factory at 2 P.M. today to______the damage caused to the packing machine.
Out of all of next year's______, we should primarily focus on reducing our expenditures by 15 percent.
Please______all staff members that parking permits must be visibly displayed on parked vehicles at all times.
A recent journal article indicates that conducting on-the-job training______helps to keep employees productive and alert.
With regret, those who______Naim Manufacturing within the past month will not be eligible for the Employee of the Quarter Award.
In addition to being_____to division supervisor, Mr. Smalling will also receive a company car.
The quality assurance team uses a process______of several methodical steps.
As per company policy, each staff member is entitled to a 20-minute break______ in the morning and in the afternoon.
As expected, Pistone Technology Group reported impressive quarterly figures,______ surpassing the previous quarter's earnings.
Digital Digest Magazine has awarded its highest______in technical performance to the Mobium 6 smartphone.
We are asking______who is a fan of Trident Audio products to join our focus group and market research study.
Due to the renovation of the reception area, staff must access the building through theeast wing entrance______the main entrance.
This equipment is to be used______as instructed by your fitness instructor.
For______purposes, guests must allow the hotel's front desk staff to make a copy of their passports.
Preliminary research says that language barriers will make it impossible to sell most of our______toys abroad.
Ms. Dennings was unable to finish her proposal______schedule due to an unexpected increase in her workload.
Industry analysts predict that rising oil prices will make gas price increases of up to 20 percent ______in some Western countries.
The CEO is reluctant to slow down production of the LD20 and LD35, as______laptop models are still selling at a fairly consistent rate.
At the weekly meeting, Ms. Jacobson described the advertising campaign that______created in an effort to target youngerconsumers.
As soon as Muldoon Grill & Restaurant______its menu, the chefs started having difficulty cooking the wider range of dishes.
